Replying to @AndyDavies 2018-04-17 08:38
@AndyDavies @benschwarz You rang?! I strongly favor using a static site generator to give good control over f/e perf and give solid workflows and deployment options. For authors, git is a no go, but you can use it invisibly behind the scenes with @NetlifyCMS or use a #headless option like @contentful
